---
name: Feature request
about: Suggest a new skill, workflow, or improvement to the template
title: "[FEAT] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ""
---

## Summary

A clear, concise description of what you'd like added or improved.

## Type of request

<!-- Check one -->

- [ ] New skill
- [ ] New workflow
- [ ] Enhancement to an existing skill or workflow
- [ ] New agent support (which agent: _________________)
- [ ] README or documentation improvement
- [ ] Other: _________________

## Problem it solves

Describe the problem or limitation this addresses. What can't you do today, or what takes too many manual steps?

## Proposed solution

Describe the solution you'd like. If it's a new skill, a rough outline of what it should do and when it should be invoked is very helpful.

## Which AI agents would benefit?

- [ ] All agents (universal)
- [ ] Claude Code only
- [ ] GitHub Copilot only
- [ ] Jules / Gemini / Antigravity only
- [ ] Other: _________________

## Alternatives considered

Any alternative approaches or implementations you've thought about.

## Additional context

Any other context, examples, or references that support this request.
